about_the_game:
Play as lil slime dude Celex Wallacin, and run, climb, and celling fling your way through this challenging precision platformer in early development

- Currently 35 Levels of fast paced platforming action.

- Easy and accessible main levels with challenging side paths and brutally placed collectables makes a fun experience for all skill levels

- Simple to learn, hard to master, the controls are quick to learn so starting the game is easy as (placeholder easy thing)

- Respawns are quick and painless allowing you to keep playing without the fear of death... unless you lose all 1000 of your lives >:D

Good luck, have a swell time yo

Features in development

- Level Selector

- Time trials

- The rest of the  actual game
detailed_description:
Play as lil slime dude Celex Wallacin, and run, climb, and celling fling your way through this challenging precision platformer in early development

- Easy and accessible main levels with challenging side paths and brutally placed collectables makes a fun experience for all skill levels

- Simple to learn, hard to master, the controls are quick to learn so starting the game is easy as (placeholder easy thing)

- Respawns are quick and painless allowing you to keep playing without the fear of death... unless you lose all 1000 of your lives >:D

Good luck, have a swell time yo

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu
  • Processor: 1GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 10 years
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Pixel Panic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 10 years
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Celex Wallacin wakes up to find out he's in the wrong game 0_0. Venture through other games to get Celex back to his own game in this tough as nails precision platformer
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
